name: The Frayed Ends: Prologue
description:
Read description.

 Game System Requirements:

CPU: Intel i3 or better

GPU: Geforce GTX 1650

RAM: 8GB

OS: Windows 64bit

This is my first game. The game is a 10-15 minute teaser prologue for the main game coming in the future. The Frayed Ends has a fictional story inspired by people who suffered from PTSD. This teaser does not contain all the details you need to fully understand the main story. Stay tuned for the full game.

Main facts you need to know:

You are a WW2 soldier who suffers from PTSD after the war and you experience unusual events that even if they are in your head, you end up commiting suicide.

Disclaimers:

There is an after credits scene.

All the assets i used are copyright free.
